`jeksterslabRds` is a collection of functions that I find useful
in studying Data Science and Statistics concepts and methods.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `jeksterslabRds` from [GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslabds/jeksterslabRds) with:

```r
remotes::install_github("jeksterslabds/jeksterslabRds")
```

## Example

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslabds.github.io/jeksterslabRds/index.html)
for package documentation.
